title: Browser tour
description: This year I noticed that long-established traditional set of browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Opera) started to supplemented by a new generation of alternatives. Personally, for the last few years I've been switching back and forth between Chrome and Safari (peeking at Firefox from a long distance), but the drums of Brave, Vivaldi, Edge, Arc and SigmaOS are getting stronger and stronger. So to add some variety to the day-to-day routine I decided to try something new and share it with youu.
